title: In all types of buildings, individual toilets and pantry should be provided for executives and for meeting / seminar / conference rooms, etc
clause_text: In all types of buildings, individual toilets and pantry should be provided for executives and for meeting / seminar / conference rooms, etc. as per the user requirement. Where food is consumed indoors, water stations may be provided in place of drinking water fountains.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In all types of buildings, individual toilets and pantry should be provided for executives and for meeting / seminar / conference rooms, etc. as per the user requirement.
